task.title: Insert The Platen Roller
task.shortdesc: You can insert your platen roller into your typewriter by attaching the platen roller to the typewriter's platen detent shaft and locking the platen into place.

step.cmd: Line up the left end of your platen roller with the platen detent shaft.
Slide your platen roller onto the detent shaft.
Push the platen roller downwards until it is parallel with the typewriter carriage.
Push the platen detent arm inwards, towards the platen, to lock the platen roller into place.
